body_html:
@gunan It is a good point but also on large repositories/communities like Kubernetes the release labels are just a desired target. When you are aware to skip the release target, best-effort, the label is re-target again.
So here we are not talking about managing release blocking labels.

body:
@gunan It is a good point but also on large repositories/communities like Kubernetes the release labels are just a desired target. When you are aware to skip the release target, best-effort, the label is re-target again.
So here we are not talking about managing release blocking labels.
